songs.title: Counting Stars / Holy Grail / Smells Like Teen Spirit
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Perrie, **Jesy** & *All* ]
Lately I've been, I've been losing sleep
Dreaming about the things that we could be, Oh
Baby, I've been, I've been praying hard
**I've been praying hard**
Said no more counting dollars
We'll be counting *stars*

[Verse 1: Perrie]
I see this life
Like a swinging vine
Swing my heart across the line
In my face is flashing signs
Seek it out and you shall find
Old, but I'm not that old
Young, but I'm not that bold
I don't think the world is sold
I'm just doing what we're told

[Verse 2: Jade & *All*]
I feel something so right doing the wrong thing
I feel something so wrong doing the right thing
*I could lie, could lie, could lie*
Everything that kills me makes me feel alive

[Chorus: All]
Lately I've been, I've been losing sleep
Dreaming about the things that we could be
Baby, I've been, I've been praying hard
Said no more counting dollars
We'll be counting stars

[Verse 3: Jesy]
Ooooh, you take the clothes off my back
And I let you
You'd steal the food right out my mouth
And I'd watch you eat it
I still don't know why
Why I love it so much
Oh yeah

[Verse 4: Leigh-Anne & *All*]
You curse my name
*My name*
In spite to put me to shame *(I've been losing sleep)*
Have my laundry in the streets
Dirty or clean
Give it up for fame
And I still don't know why *(baby I've been, I've been praying hard)*
Why I love it so much

[Post- Chorus: Jesy, **Jade** & *All*]
Said no more counting dollars, *we'll be counting stars*
**Baby**
*It's amazing I'm in this maze with you*
*I just can't crack your code*
*One day you're screamin' you love me loud*
*The next day you're so cold*
*One day you're here, one day you're there, one day you care*
*You're so unfair*
*Sipping from your cup till it runneth over*
*Holy Grail, holy grail ooooh!*
*Holy grail*
**And we're all just entertainers**
**And we're stupid, and contagious**
**Cuz' we're all just** *(said no more counting dollars)*
**Entertainers** *(said no more counting dollars)*
**And we're stupid** *(said no more counting dollars)*
*Oh! I've been praying*
*(said no more counting dollars)*
**Entertainers** *(said no more counting dollars)*
**And we're stupid** *(said no more counting dollars)*
**And contagious** *(said no more counting dollars)*
*Oh! I've been praying* *(said no more counting dollars)*
*(said no more counting dollars)*

[Outro: All]
I'll be praying, we'll be counting
Stars
